rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral verbs like "will cull" and "was confirmed" and lacks high-potency language. "highly pathogenic" is technical.
'will cull' is a containment verb (future/plan); containment verbs are Neutral even with large numbers unless vivid language is added.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports on culling after an outbreak but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
